title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to NBC play by play announcer Mike Tirico about calling tonight's Rams/Bills game. DP gives his Super Bowl prediction for the 2022 season. Director of DraftKings Sportsbook Operations Johnny Avello shares Super Bowl bets and best value bets for the season. And Steve Palazzolo of Pro Football Focus tells us the best/worst rosters going into the season.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
